```{r}
library(brms)
library(modelr)
library(tidybayes)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
d <- tribble(
  ~author, ~total, ~unqual, ~cond,
  "Dan", 480, 0, 0,
  "Julia", 477, 3, 9,
)
```

```{r}
uq_model <- 
  brm(data = d, family = binomial,
      unqual | trials(total) ~ author,
      prior = c(set_prior("normal(0,10)", class = "b")),
      iter = 5000, warmup = 100, cores = 1, chains = 1)
```
